testcase.name: setRequestStatusToGo_whenRequestNotInNotYetStatus_shouldReturnEmpty
testcase.system-out: 2025-07-09T17:44:16.831Z INFO 11592 --- [media-generator] [ main] c.e.m.service.MediaRequestService : Setting request status to GO for id: 1 2025-07-09T17:44:16.835Z WARN 11592 --- [media-generator] [ main] c.e.m.service.MediaRequestService : Request 1 is not in NOT_YET state, cannot set to GO. Current state: RUNNING

testcase.name: formatRequestToPrompt_whenRequestNotFound_shouldReturnEmpty
testcase.system-out: 2025-07-09T17:44:16.862Z INFO 11592 --- [media-generator] [ main] c.e.m.service.MediaRequestService : Attempting to format prompt for request ID: 1 2025-07-09T17:44:16.863Z WARN 11592 --- [media-generator] [ main] c.e.m.service.MediaRequestService : Request ID 1 not found for prompt formatting.

testcase.name: formatRequestToPrompt_whenRequestExistsAndEligible_andGeminiFails_shouldSetStatusToFail
testcase.system-out: 2025-07-09T17:44:16.898Z INFO 11592 --- [media-generator] [ main] c.e.m.service.MediaRequestService : Attempting to format prompt for request ID: 1 2025-07-09T17:44:16.899Z INFO 11592 --- [media-generator] [ main] c.e.m.service.MediaRequestService : Request ID 1 status set to FORMATTING_PROMPT. 2025-07-09T17:44:16.899Z WARN 11592 --- [media-generator] [ main] c.e.m.service.MediaRequestService : Prompt formatting failed for request ID: 1. Response from GeminiService: Erreur: Gemini API error.

testcase.name: setRequestStatusToGo_whenRequestNotFound_shouldReturnEmpty
testcase.system-out: 2025-07-09T17:44:16.906Z INFO 11592 --- [media-generator] [ main] c.e.m.service.MediaRequestService : Setting request status to GO for id: 1 2025-07-09T17:44:16.907Z WARN 11592 --- [media-generator] [ main] c.e.m.service.MediaRequestService : Request with id 1 not found, cannot set to GO.

testcase.name: formatRequestToPrompt_whenRequestExistsAndEligible_andGeminiSucceeds_shouldSetPromptGenerated
testcase.system-out: 2025-07-09T17:44:16.914Z INFO 11592 --- [media-generator] [ main] c.e.m.service.MediaRequestService : Attempting to format prompt for request ID: 1 2025-07-09T17:44:16.915Z INFO 11592 --- [media-generator] [ main] c.e.m.service.MediaRequestService : Request ID 1 status set to FORMATTING_PROMPT. 2025-07-09T17:44:16.915Z INFO 11592 --- [media-generator] [ main] c.e.m.service.MediaRequestService : Prompt formatting successful for request ID: 1. Received prompt starting with: Mocked Gemini prompt content....

testcase.name: formatRequestToPrompt_whenRequestNotEligibleStatus_shouldReturnEmpty
testcase.system-out: 2025-07-09T17:44:16.929Z INFO 11592 --- [media-generator] [ main] c.e.m.service.MediaRequestService : Attempting to format prompt for request ID: 1 2025-07-09T17:44:16.930Z WARN 11592 --- [media-generator] [ main] c.e.m.service.MediaRequestService : Request ID 1 is in status RUNNING and cannot be formatted into a prompt at this stage.

testcase.name: setRequestStatusToGo_whenRequestExistsAndStatusIsNutYet_shouldUpdateStatus
testcase.system-out: 2025-07-09T17:44:16.938Z INFO 11592 --- [media-generator] [ main] c.e.m.service.MediaRequestService : Setting request status to GO for id: 1

testcase.name: updateRequestStatus_shouldUpdateFieldsAndSave
testcase.system-out: 2025-07-09T17:44:16.947Z INFO 11592 --- [media-generator] [ main] c.e.m.service.MediaRequestService : Updating status for request id 1: Status=FAIL, Error='Test Error', Path='/path/to/media.mp4', Prompt='Test Prompt...'

testcase.name: submitNewRequest_shouldSaveAndReturnRequest
testcase.system-out: 2025-07-09T17:44:16.953Z INFO 11592 --- [media-generator] [ main] c.e.m.service.MediaRequestService : Submitting new media request for scenario: Test Scenario...
